website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo IdeaPad Miix 10 Tablet is a fairly well-built Windows slate tablet, but it does little to distinguish itself in a crowded field of competitors.
cons: Intel Atom processor offers limited performance

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet, unfortunately for me the wireless adapter was ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet, unfortunately for me the wireless adapter was faulty, every time I tried to connect to my wireless router the adapter would disable its self and then after telling me it could not connect it would re enable itself making the troubleshooter unable to diagnose the problem, I tried power options, new drivers but to no avail so had to send it back, real shame as it would if been the perfect devise for me...
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tablet, I'm on my second screen now as ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice Tablet, I'm on my second screen now as I dropped the first one, a replacement screen was hard to find, but once I did find one fitting it\ was easy. This little tablet goes every where with me, and is really quite robust, with a decent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed with this item
customer_reviews.text: softward problems. The tablet - after about 6 months, stopped recognising any Wireless Networks. Sent it in to Lenovo, after about 6 weeks, they sent back without doing any sort of repairs - without explanation. Amazon was kind to accept the faulty item back and refunded us the money. very disappointed with this item! lenovo is definitely not what it used to be ....
customer_reviews.author: anjuta

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Tablet newby's.
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the versatility of this Lenovo tablet especially when fitted with the keyboard, as I am new to the tablet technology I can use it like a laptop until I work out all the different ways the tablet operating systems work for me. I was tempted to buy a tablet that is more like my smartphone but I am glad I didn't as there would not have enough difference to make it worthwhile and I like the Microsoft software I am used to.
customer_reviews.author: Billybong

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen stopped working after 1 year of use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in Nov-2013. Just over a year, its touchscreen doesn't respond anymore even though I always use it with due care and it never dropped or clashed into anything. Very disappointed and frustrated. No good! Choose something else but not this. Waste of your hard earned money!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Paulissen

customer_reviews.title: Good minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is great, very responsive, very clear, it works with my wierd Xbox controller but there is one major downfall... The micro usb is at the bottom. This means if the keyboard is accessed no external devices can be. But the tablet has full Windows 8 and can run plenty of my old games. Flash games don't work with a keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Allard Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best purchases that I have made. Shame that windows 8.1 is so bad as a product. Screen is clear and I find it easy to remove from the keyboard and attach to an RJ45 dongle if needed
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: Good construction: The cover is a bit on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good construction: The cover is a bit on the heavy side and covers the USB port (stupid), but it's otherwise a very good all-around machine. We updated it to 8.1 and it still woks like a charm. Very competitive at this price.
customer_reviews.author: tec-goblin

customer_reviews.title: Other than than very happy
customer_reviews.text: Could do with another usb input so you can use the keyboard as well as plugging in a hard drive etc. Other than than very happy
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Good Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet computer, the only issue I have with it is that it only has 1 USB connection and you can only this when the keyboard is not attached. Other than this it is a great windows tablet.
customer_reviews.author: arj

customer_reviews.title: Smart Pad/Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Having a full keyboard is a bonus with this pad, overall works well but won't upgrade to windows 8.1 which might be due to the spcec
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Wilson

customer_reviews.title: great tablet
customer_reviews.text: great tablet only one gripe battery does not last 10 hours more like 6 but still very pleased with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: MRS P Walters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery great item and value for money thanks
customer_reviews.author: martyn brailsford

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not that great and a bit slow in responding. Lot of lag during skype calls.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna

customer_reviews.title: good but
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a windows 8 tablet with a keyboard, this has it but the pin imput to charge it lets it down, why not a mini usb? The usb is not useable when the tablet is fixed to the keyboard, why was this designed like this? These 2 points let down what could have been a great buy. If it had had those 2 things it would have got 5 stars. Come on Lenovo you can do better
customer_reviews.author: Shiny bird

customer_reviews.title: Screen is nice and clear
customer_reviews.text: The Tablet is very user friendly. Screen is nice and clear. I would recommend it as it does what it says on the tin. The only downfall in the purchase was that it was advertised as 'Silver' but a black one arrived. Not too disappointed but feel that the colour should have been as advertised or at least some explanation why another colour.
customer_reviews.author: Gillyg

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: As the saying goes " you get what you pay for", it is a reasonable product but I found it slow and could not get the WiFi to work. After a day or so trying to connect to WiFi, I had to admit defeat and return the Lenovo. Since then, I have bought a SURFACE computer which is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I choose this product for everyday use. And Intel Atom processor have enough power for day to day activities. Pros: The IPS display is awesome to look at. The 5 point multi touch. The speaker is very loud. Con: A mouse pad in the folio case, would have been an added advantage when using desktop. Only one mini usb prot, when using with keyboard there is no more usb to connect with.
customer_reviews.author: Balaji Kannan

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this device. It was easy to set up and the supplied keyboard/folder is very useful. Like other purchasers, I would have given it 5 stars if the USB port had been accessible with the tablet fitted to the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Colin.T

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: tiis tablet is set up for america,I phoned lenovo five times but it would not accept the changes given. I was not prepared to keep phoning on premier phone calls with no result. Why are these sold here which are not set for UK?
customer_reviews.author: R,Smith

customer_reviews.title: My colleague loves this as a lightweight way of keeping ...
customer_reviews.text: My colleague loves this as a lightweight way of keeping up with her work, whilst visiting her sick relative in Italy. A very successful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gope

product_meta.title: Lenovo Miix 10 10.1-inch Tablet (Silver) - (Intel Atom Z2760 1.8GHz Processor, 2GB RAM, 64GB eMMC, WLAN, BT, Webcam, Windows 8 MM)
product_meta.description:
LENOVO MIIX TABLET
MIIX UP YOUR ENTERTAINMENT 
Experience multiple ways to access and enjoy your videos, photos, games and more with the Lenovo Miix. The 10.1" HD display tablet, pre-loaded with Microsoft's Windows 8 and an Intel Atom dual core processor, can quickly flip from a tablet to a notebook with the included attachable folio case/keyboard -- making it perfect for productivity while on the go.

AT A GLANCE
 *  Intel Atom Dual Core processor 
 *  10.1” HD display (1366x768) touchscreen with IPS wide-view technology 
 *  64GB eMMC storage, with up to 32GB add-on micro-SDHC card support 
 *  2GB LP DDR2 memory 
 *  Five-point multi-touch display

Switch instantly from a tablet to a notebook. MIIX OF TABLET AND FULL-FUNCTION LAPTOP PC
ADAPT QUICKLY FOR WORK AND PLAY
The Miix combines the productivity of a laptop with the touch experience of a tablet, taking full advantage of the Windows RT functionality. Instantly switch between laptop and tablet modes with an optional ‘quick flip’ detachable folio case and integrated AccuType keyboard that is as stable on your lap as a notebook.

The finger-friendly curved key shape and ergonomic spacebar of the AccuType keyboard will work together to make it easier to type and reduce the number of typos, wherever you find yourself working. The keyboard and case are sold separately. 

The Miix features five-point multi-touch technology. FIVE-POINT MULTI-TOUCH DISPLAY
The Miix features five-point multi-touch technology for the ability to effortlessly control apps, browse the web, and play engaging games. This innovative screen is sensitive and easy to use with five fingers at once, making typing easier and offering a responsive gaming experience.

FRONT-FACING WEBCAM
Take your web chats to the next level thanks to the built-in 1.0 MP front-facing webcam which lets you stream higher-definition images, giving you clearer picture, perfect for capturing those special moments on photo and video and sharing them with your friends and family through video chats. 

MICRO-SD CARD SLOT AND HDMI OUTPUT
If you need more space for your favourite multimedia the expansion slot allows you to insert micro-SDHC memory cards into your tablet. This means you can expand your storage space from the already huge 64 GB and transfer files between mobile devices easily. You can also swap videos and photos directly with your camera.

There is also a HDMI output for connecting to a compatible HDTV or home theatre receiver so you can watch videos and view pictures with uncompressed digital audio and video via a single cable.

The Miix is 10.1mm at its thickest and weighs 580g. MIIX IT UP WHILE ON THE MOVE 
The slim 10mm design of the Miix, coupled with the soft-touch rear cover, makes it comfortable to hold and use for long periods. At 10.1mm at its thickest and weighing 580g (1.27Ibs), you'll find the Miix is extremely portable and perfect for using while travelling or for everyday commuting.

 The 10.1" (1366 x 768) HD display, with 16:9 IPS wide screen technology, is large enough for easy viewing, while being small enough to slip into a bag.

OPTIMISED FOR ENTERTAINMENT
POWERFUL INTEL PROCESSOR 
The Intel Atom Dual Core Processor is designed to keep you moving -- allowing you to listen, watch and play without worrying about the battery life. Enjoy fast web-browsing, super-responsive apps and seamless downloads, all with your Miix tablet.

Enjoy up to 10 hours of battery life between charges.  Also on the Miix, which comes preloaded with Windows 8, you'll find up to 2 GB of fast DDR2 memory, up to 64 GB of eMMC internal storage, plus up to 32 GB of micro-SDHC expandable storage, meaning you can access large numbers of files quickly and easily. 

INTEGRATED BLUETOOTH 4.0 
The Miix comes with multiple wireless connection options. The built-in 802.11b/g/n Wi-Fi adapter will allow you to enjoy reliable connections to the internet, whether at home or on a public network, while Bluetooth 4.0 is available to make it easier to connect and share files with other devices. The 3G models also feature 3G-GPS connectivity. Using the superior connectivity options you can easily and seamlessly switch from one to another to get the best from your tablet.

LONG-LASTING BATTERY LIFE
The Miix comes with a long-life 6800 mAh li-polymer battery, so you can get the most out of your tablet between charges. With Wi-Fi connected you will be able to enjoy up to 10 hours of online productivity and entertainment on the go before needing to top up the charge.

WINDOWS 8 WITH LENOVO ENHANCED EXPERIENCE 8
Created specifically for Microsoft’s Windows 8 OS, Lenovo has combined hardware and software features to form Lenovo Enhanced Experience 8.

Lenovo Cloud - Imagine your files, everywhere. Lenovo's online storage and cloud utilities allow you the freedom to choose your device and location. With 5 GB of free storage, you'll be able to secure and access your files wherever you are, and on whatever machine you find yourself on.

Exclusive Lenovo Content - Discover all the amazing things you can do with exclusive tools from Lenovo. Learn how to get the most from your PC with Lenovo Companion or monitor your system performance with Lenovo Support. Lenovo keeps you up to date and delivers music, game and video content you can get from no one else.

LENOVO TABLET COMPARISON CHART
Miix 2 8 Miix 2 10 Miix 2 11 Display 8-inch 10.1-inch 11.6-inch Colour options Silver Silver Silver Processor Intel Atom quad-core Intel Atom Z2760 Intel Core i3-4012Y
Intel Core i5-4202Y Processor speed 1.33 GHz 1.8 GHz 1.5 GHz
1.6 GHz Multi-touch display 5-point 5-point 10-point Operating System Windows 8.1 Windows 8 Windows 8.1 VeriFace Pro ✔ Integrated JBL-designed stereo speakers ✔ Cameras 2.0 MP front-facing webcam
5 MP rear-facing camera 1.0 MP front-facing webcam 2.0 MP front-facing webcam
5 MP rear-facing camera Bluetooth 4.0 ✔ ✔ ✔ Battery life Up to seven hours Up to 10 hours Up to six hours Micro-SD card slot ✔ ✔ ✔ Keyboard dock included ✔ ✔ HDMI output ✔ ✔ 

BOX CONTAINS

Folio Case
AC Adapter

feature_bullets: Features five-point multi-touch allows 5 fingers to interact with the screen at once
Thin and light for carrying and operation
